title.rendered: The team drew after winning 79 consecutive matches at home

content.rendered:
Johan Cruyff Stadium, home ground of Barcelona women’s team. The Barca girls have made the stadium an impregnable fortress named after the late Dutch legend. It only became big news when the opposition returned home with 1 point from the Johan Cruyff Stadium. As the news is in Levante. Levante’s women’s team returned to Barcelona on Wednesday night with a 1-1 draw. Barca women’s team lost points after winning 79 consecutive matches in all competitions at home.

The hosts last scored a point in 2019 before Wednesday. Barca lost 3-2 at home to Sporting de Huelva in the 2018-19 La Liga season. The team lost the first point after winning the first 16 matches in this year’s women’s La Liga.

Barca’s only goal was scored by Salma Parayello yesterdayAFP file photo

Despite the draw with Levante, Barca is 9 points ahead of nearest rivals Real Madrid. The team has 49 points in 17 matches. 40 points for Real in an even match. Levante are third with 38 points, 1 point away from Johan Cruyff Stadium.Read more

Rajkot Test: Rohit-Jadeja’s century, Sarfraz’s glimpse before regret

Barça took the early lead in Wednesday’s match. Spain’s World Cup winning player Salma Parayuelo scored in the 21st minute. Levante equalized with Alba Redondo’s goal in the 55th minute. Barca’s girls, who drew at home after four years, set a league record for consecutive wins last year. The team drew with Sevilla after winning 62 matches in a row in Women’s La Liga .
